objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about education and learning using formal register
Students create original thriller themed content about education and learning in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using formal register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in formal register within thriller theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
